trans-unit.source: Learn Hadoop in HDInsight with the Sample Gallery | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Learn Hadoop in HDInsight with the Sample Gallery | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Quickly learn Hadoop by running sample applications from the HDInsight Getting Started Gallery.
trans-unit.target: Quickly learn Hadoop by running sample applications from the HDInsight Getting Started Gallery.

trans-unit.source: Use sample data or supply your own.
trans-unit.target: Use sample data or supply your own.

trans-unit.source: Learn Hadoop by using the Azure HDInsight Getting Started Gallery
trans-unit.target: Learn Hadoop by using the Azure HDInsight Getting Started Gallery

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight Getting Started Gallery provides an easy and quick way learn Hadoop by running sample applications in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight Getting Started Gallery provides an easy and quick way learn Hadoop by running sample applications in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Some of the samples come with sample data.
trans-unit.target: Some of the samples come with sample data.

trans-unit.source: You can supply your own data for the remaining samples.
trans-unit.target: You can supply your own data for the remaining samples.

trans-unit.source: Currently, there are the following six samples (with more coming):
trans-unit.target: Currently, there are the following six samples (with more coming):

trans-unit.source: Solutions with your Azure data
trans-unit.target: Solutions with your Azure data

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure website log analysis
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure website log analysis

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure storage analytics
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure storage analytics

trans-unit.source: Solutions with sample data
trans-unit.target: Solutions with sample data

trans-unit.source: Sensor data analysis
trans-unit.target: Sensor data analysis

trans-unit.source: Twitter trend analysis
trans-unit.target: Twitter trend analysis

trans-unit.source: Website log analysis
trans-unit.target: Website log analysis

trans-unit.source: Mahout movie recommendation
trans-unit.target: Mahout movie recommendation

trans-unit.source: The following video shows how to run the Twitter trend analysis sample:
trans-unit.target: The following video shows how to run the Twitter trend analysis sample:

trans-unit.source: https://www.youtube.com/embed/7ePbHot1SN4>
trans-unit.target: https://www.youtube.com/embed/7ePbHot1SN4>

trans-unit.source: The Dashboard can be accessed by browsing to http://
trans-unit.target: The Dashboard can be accessed by browsing to http://

trans-unit.source: .azurehdinsight.net/ or from the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: .azurehdinsight.net/ or from the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: **To run a sample from the Getting Started Gallery**
trans-unit.target: **To run a sample from the Getting Started Gallery**

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the [Azure Portal][azure.portal].
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the [Azure Portal][azure.portal].

trans-unit.source: Click **Browse** from the left menu, click **HDInsight Clusters**, and then click your cluster name.
trans-unit.target: Click **Browse** from the left menu, click **HDInsight Clusters**, and then click your cluster name.

trans-unit.source: Click **Dashboard** from the top menu.
trans-unit.target: Click **Dashboard** from the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Enter the user name and password for the HTTP user (also called the cluster user).
trans-unit.target: Enter the user name and password for the HTTP user (also called the cluster user).

trans-unit.source: Click **Getting Started Gallery** at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Getting Started Gallery** at the top of the page.

trans-unit.source: Click one of the samples.
trans-unit.target: Click one of the samples.

trans-unit.source: Each sample gives detailed steps for running it.
trans-unit.target: Each sample gives detailed steps for running it.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows the Twitter trend analysis sample:
trans-unit.target: The following image shows the Twitter trend analysis sample:

trans-unit.source: ![HDInsight Twitter trend analysis sample][hdinsight.twitter.sample]
trans-unit.target: ![HDInsight Twitter trend analysis sample][hdinsight.twitter.sample]
